title: Reply to Comment on "No Black Holes from Light" [arXiv:2408.06714]
authors:
\'Alvaro \'Alvarez-Dom\'inguez, Luis J. Garay, Eduardo
  Mart\'in-Mart\'inez, Jos\'e Polo-G\'omez
abstract:
We discuss how the comment by A. Loeb [arXiv:2408.06714] has no bearing on
the results of Phys. Rev. Lett. 133, 041401 (2024) [arXiv:2405.02389].
